task.description: Add voice recording functionality to the logbook application. Implement browser-based audio recording, storage of voice notes with timestamps, and playback capabilities.
requirements: Implement browser MediaRecorder API for voice recording
Add record/stop/play buttons to the logbook interface
Store voice recordings with timestamps and metadata
Implement audio file management and storage
Add playback controls for voice notes
Write comprehensive tests for voice functionality
Follow coding standards and security best practices
deliverables: Audio file storage and retrieval system
Updated UI with voice recording controls
